blog.description: My place for some writing of the fabulous Harry Styles. Kissy.

title: Late Night Trains
body:
Warning: Smut

Harry and you had been visiting some friends up in Scotland, but since Harry had some scheduled events in the morning, you had to get on the late night train from Scotland all the way down to London.

“Let’s take this one”, Harry said and opened a compartment door to your right. It was completely empty, but that was no surprise as you were travelling this late, so there were only a few people on the train anyway.

You huffed as you slumped in your seat next to Harry. “I mean I really like Rosy, but damn, does she always have to talk that much?”, you said, finally having Harry all to yourself again. He immediately pulled you into his chest.
“I guess you do have a point, love”, he said, enjoying this comfortable silence, too. None of you said anything for a while, you just listened to the sound of the train moving and quietly enjoying each others company.

Harry started to play with your hair as you continued to cuddle, and soon, you found yourself tracing the tattoos on his arm, inching higher and higher until you reached his collarbone. You could feel his breath hitching for a moment, until he continued to breathe in a quicker pace. You smirked as you looked up to your boyfriend, whose cheeks were now tinted in a delicate blush. Yes, maybe you two had some catching up to do, since you couldn’t even share a single kiss today because Rosy just kept talking and talking…

Harry’s lips curved into your favourite dimpled smile, before you coud feel them on the side of your neck. Harry placed some feathery kisses here and there, until he brushed his lips over the one spot that drove you mad every. damn. time. And this little shit here did it on purpose. He kissed it even harder and started to suck on the skin, making sure there’d be a mark.

You moved your hands to the back of his neck, reaching for his curls and slightly tugging on them. He groaned slightly, making you chuckle.

Harry pulled away from your neck, now reaching for your waist so he could pull you into his lap. You happily obliged, giggling when Harry cupped your bum in his large hands. You leant your forehead against his, your breath mingling in such a delicate way.

“Missed you all day, darlin’“, Harry whispered.

You smiled before you slowly closed the distance between your lips. You enjoyed the feeling of his soft, plumb lips on yours, and you could still taste a little hint of the coffee you had at Glenn’s shortly before you had left.

At first, the kiss was very lazy, as the two of you were savoring it. It was only when Harry squeezed your bum a little and caused you to gasp that he slipped his tongue inside of your mouth. The kiss immediately became more heated, as the two of you explored each others mouths. Of course, after all those kisses that you had shared, you were completely familiar with each other, but that didn’t make this any less interesting. For a little while, all that could be heard in the compartment was the sound of your lips against his and your breathing, which became faster the longer you kissed.

“Hhhmmm”, you hummed, “I wan’ you so bad righ’ now.”

Harry chuckled, the sound muffled against your lip.

“Y’ know I’d be down to it, but I don’ know if we should do it righ’ here”, he said after pulling away.

“Such a pity”, you pouted.

“But you know, it’s such a long ride, I think I might need a wee righ’ now”, he said, a mischievous grin spreading across his features.

You slowly mounted down from his lap, sitting back onto the bench next to him.

“Well maybe you should go then”, you said in a teasing manner.

“Maybe you could come check on me in a few minutes? I’d probably need a hand”, he whispered before he got up and went out of the compartment. Your gaze followed him down the aisle, where you supposed the toilets were.After a minute or two, you followed him down the aisle, gently knocking on the door of the toilet.

Immediately, the door was unlocked and you sneaked in. It wasn’t very roomy in there, especially when it wasn’t made for two people, so you found yourself pushed against Harry in an instant. You could feel a bulge forming in his pants when Harry embraced you, reconnecting your lips. This time, the kiss was tongue, more lips, and a bit of moaning.

“Shh, keep quiet for me, will ya, love?”, Harry said. “Don’ wanna get caught, do we?”

You couldn’t help but smirk at the thought of that. You’d never been intimate in public before, but if you were honest, it turned you on a little bit.

You quickly kissed Harry again, who now pressed you against the door of the small cabin. Harry quickly pulled out the condom that he had snuck into the cabin in his back pocket, before your hands wandered down his abdomen and started to fumble with his belt, finally opening his jeans so they could fall down to the floor along with his boxers. You fought back a moan at the sight of his member. While Harry started to undress you, you quickly took the condom from him and put it onto him, pumping his lenght up and down a few times until he finally got rid of your pants and knickers. Harry reached down to touch you a few times, too, rubbing your clit at first and then quickly pumping two fingers in and out of you.

“So wet already fo’ me, love”, he whispered into your ear as he took the fingers to his mouth and licked your juices off.

You had been placing soft kisses on the side of his neck as he said “Jump” in that raspy, deep voice of his that drove you mad.

Of course, you happily obliged, wrapping your legs around his waist. You already felt his cock at your entrance, but since Harry was holding you up with both his hands, it was you who guided his length into you. He was very careful, as always, letting you adjust to him before he slowly started to move.

“‘s tha’ okay, baby?”, he asked.

You nodded. “You feel so good, H”, you whispered. You closed the distance between your lips again, so you wouldn’t have to fight back your moans so hard.

You both were so worked up already from having to wait for this all day, so it took Harry only a few well-practiced thrusts to have you both on the verge of cumming.

“Shit, ‘m close, Harry”, you whispered against his hips.

“Me too”, he said. After two more of those deep thrusts of him, you rolled your eyes back in pleasure. You could feel Harry’s cock twitch inside of you two.
This time it was Harry who had to fight back moans, because the feeling of having you clench around him was just a little bit too much to handle for now. Before any sound could escape his lips however, you kissed him again, lazy this time. The only thing audible was your heavy breathing. 

As you recollected yourself, Harry gently pulled out of you and set you down onto your own feet. He disposed of the condom while you cleaned yourself up a bit.

“Maybe we should have an encore at home”, he said as the two of you got dressed.

“Definitely”, you answered and smiled into the kiss.

“You ready to go?”, Harry asked as he smoothed down the last few strands of your hair that had gotten a little bit out of place.

As you nodded, he opened the lock of the toilet door and peeked down the hallway.

“C’mon”, he whispered and took your hand in his as you made your way down to your compartment, the blush on your faces and the marks on your neck giving you away.

Really hope you liked it! If you want to request something, you can do that here or you can view all of my posts here.

summary: you and harry performing together as friends who secretly like each other would include...
body:
you and harry performing together as friends who secretly like each other would include…

- cuddles, lots of cuddling in the tour bus when ur both so tired after another night of performing.

- offering harry your food when he says that he’s hungry despite your brain telling u not to because je-sus-christ it’s food. then he’d smirk like the cheeky little shit that he is and end up scarfing down the entire meal.

- you’d slap him, he’d curse at you in return.

- you would get angry but then he’d pout and grin because he knows that u can’t stay mad at him forever.

- telling him to “fuck off” coz he’s really starting to make you genuinely angry.

- wearing his clothes without his permission.

- you’d walk around the hotel sometimes wearing nothing but pajama shorts and his shirt as your top.

- it’s ur fav ; )

- sleeping on top of his lap

- you wouldn’t know this coz ur asleep but he’d look at u admiringly while u sleep which sounds a bit creepy. but he’s harry. he doesn’t give two shits.

- him embarrassing you on stage when the two of you perform.

- he’d tell the crowd that u peed yourself once.

- you would blush like a tomato and slap his arm as hard as u can in response at his oh-so horrible, horrible joke.

- going to parties in between breaks.

- getting drunk together

- you would both dance badly, and sing at the top of ur lungs not caring what the others thought of u two because u were enjoying each other’s presence so much.

- accidentally pecking each others lips. both of ur cheeks would turn bright red.

- but then you’d kiss him again (this time not so accidentally) cos you’ve been wanting to taste him for so long.

- he’d kiss you back, but hesitantly at first.

- then he’d take over and become dominant while putting his arms around your body.

summary: I don't know if you still want smut concepts but what about Harry calling you by accident and you realize he's having a wank so...
question: I don't know if you still want smut concepts but what about Harry calling you by accident and you realize he's having a wank so you go over and watch him touch himself for awhile until you go in to touch him instead and you both end up making love on the floor that night? :)
answer:
“Y/N!” You hear, followed by what seems to be the sound of a moan.

You shake your head, wondering what exactly it is that your boyfriend could possibly be doing. He had always been such a clutz - knocking things over, somehow managing to get hit in the head by various falling objects; always, always tripping over whatever ended up underfoot.

What you didn’t expect was to enter your shared bedroom to find him lost in deep concentration, entertaining himself. Hand connected to himself in the most loving of manners, panting, with your name slipping from his parted lips at semi-regular intervals.

You felt odd watching him, but everything about him in that moment showcased his utter beauty. Pulling you into the moment alongside him - even though you were merely watching.

After several more moments, your panties starting to dampen, you were no longer able to contain yourself. You needed him, and he was clearly in need of you.

Carefully making your way to the bed, you did your best not to startle him - not wanting to cause him any unfortunate discomfort.

Delicately kissing his parted lips, you smiled as his eyes sprung open, love and neediness staring up at you. “Hey, heard you moan my name. Need a hand?”

“From you? Is that even a question?”

His voice is low, deep and sexy; drawing you to him.

Without another word, you plant your lips to his, kissing him as though your life is dependent on it - for all you knew it was.

Moving down to his exposed stomach, you lick a strip up from his navel, losing yourself in the taste of the salty sweat already glistening over his tanned skin.

“Babe,” his response is guttural, his body twitching beneath you. All need and completely at your mercy.

Your teeth gently graze his hip, his hands now lost in your hair as he tries to pull you closer. Both of you now longing to merge, to become linked through the only manner humanly possible.

“N-need,” he stutters, hands swiftly disposing of shorts. Before you can protest your undies have been pushed aside, making room for much practiced fingers to find their home inside.

Returning your lips to his, you moan into his mouth; keeping perfect timing to the carefully practiced pace of talented fingers.

“Like that, don’t you?”

“Mhm.” You can feel yourself start to verge on flooding, desperate pleas falling from your now chapped lips as you yearn for more; ache for it even.

Needing to grant unrestricted access to your fleshy parts, you reach down, making it clear that freedom is in order. You want your love to flow from your body to his, a form of osmosis that can only happen during sex.

No spoken words are needed as his arms are flung around you, your saturation allowing him to easily slip inside. Your moans telling him all he needs to know as he starts to move, kisses being plastered along every inch of reachable skin; so lost in one another that neither of you flinch when him rolling you over leads to landing on the floor.

With a slight grunt from him followed by a giggle from you, rythym is promptly resumed. Nothing able to halt the flow of love coming from the two of you.

“So … So, close.” He’s panting now, your own breath coming in spasmodic bouts as your need to burst grows more and more consuming.

Biting your bottom lip you nod, hands yanking at unruly curls as he seems to hit harder and deeper with each movement. “B-baby, C-can’t…”

Voice a soft hiss, he lines his lips up with your ear, hand not supporting his weight easily finding its way to your clit, rubbing circles that make your whole body arch up from the ground. “Let go.”

Teeth biting down harder, a hint of blood awakening your taste buds, you revel in the moment; the two of you losing yourself within seconds of one another.

“I love you,” he pants, body resting on top of your own spent one. “Thanks.”

Tiredness overtaking you, you kiss his shoulder, muttering your own ‘love you’ before closing your eyes and just breathing in the scent left behind on sweat soaked skin.

***

summary:
A N G E L 
Tell me , angel , do the skies open for you ?
Does the world fall at your feet when you breathe , full of lonely ,...
body:
A N G E L

Tell me , angel , do the skies open for you ?

Does the world fall at your feet when you breathe , full of lonely , fragile humans ,

begging for salvation?

A home is a heart and a heart is broken , a ship brought ashore will always long for the sea,

and there is a girl who has never forgotten you .

S P I L L E D I N K — A . W .

like or reblog ,please .

thank you.

title: In Transit
body:
Nineteen

March 2018Mason spent two days in bed. She kept drugging herself with sleeping pills to stay unconscious. But on the third day, she knew she needed to get up and go to work. She knew she just spent…

title: Just, Average
body:
One day, one that I was not expecting, it would all change, and I’m not sure if for the better… Or worse. (I don’t own any of the traditional Harry Potter characters).

Part Twenty-Six

Recap: Rowyn makes chocolates with her hate potion and talks Draco into swiping the “tonic” Pansy gives him. The dance is Wednesday, will Rowyn get Draco to eat the candy in time? Let’s find…

Read more…
